title: White-Lipped Tree Frog
desc:
Post 3134
Attack - None
Defense - None
- The White-Lipped Tree Frog, like other tree frogs, is native to trees. It may select a player to learn their role by looking through their window.
Attributes -
- The White-Lipped Tree Frog ignores frames and disguises.
- The White-Lipped Tree Frog is the largest known tree frog. All visitors will learn that their target was visited by a White-Lipped Tree Frog.
Goal - Keep your habitat from being destroyed and destroy those who want to destroy it.
